name: Uni Burnout
description:
The serious game Uni Burnout is about a student who receives assignments from his lecturers of three courses that must be completed within a very short deadline.
The location of this game is the home of the student.
He must try to complete the assignments from his three courses as far as possible under enormous time pressure without endangering his health.
The time passes very fast in this game. As the student works on his assignments, the stress level increases. Once the stress level reaches its maximum, the student gets burnout.  Due to the increasing stress level, the student also has to do activities such as sleeping, eating, and hanging out with friends to reduce the stress level.

The goal of the game is to complete as many assignments as possible without suffering burnout.
